title: Walt Disney's Comics and Stories Archives Volume 1
description: BOOM Kids! is proud to present one of the longest-running comics series in history, reprinted from the beginning in chronological order! WALT DISNEYâ€™S COMICS AND STORIES ARCHIVES is an essential read for any fan of Disney comics. VOLUME 1 brings readers classic Disney stories from famed creators Floyd Gottfredson, the legendary artist behind the Mickey Mouse newspaper comic strip, and Al Taliaferro, creator of fan-favorite characters Huey, Dewey and Louie.
author: Floyd Gottfredson
